duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive sales and advance company growth by selling facility services including restroom supplies, floor mats, towels, masks, and first aid solutions.
Achieve industry-leading sales goals, continuously adapting to new market demands and opportunities.
Complete a comprehensive sales training program and follow a structured sales process to achieve success.
Utilize technology including laptops, cell phones, Microsoft Office, and Customer Relationship Management System (CRM) to stay organized and connected.
Be the face of the company, providing the ultimate customer experience and persuasively demonstrating the company as the preferred supplier of choice.
